definitions.text: a painful muscle spasm especially in the neck or back (`rick' and `wrick' are British)
a sharp bend in a line produced when a line having a loop is pulled tight
a person with unusual sexual tastes
a difficulty or flaw in a plan or operation
examples: there are still a few kinks to iron out

definitions.text: form a curl, curve, or kink
examples: the cigar smoke curled up at the ceiling
